The '''Launch Tube''' is an event [[Gadget]] obtained during the [[Fleeting Colors in Flight]] event. It is used in the Smelting challenge of the [[Fleeting Colors in Flight/Flameplume Starflowers|Flameplume Starflowers]] to create [[Fireworks]]. After the end of the Fleeting Colors in Flight event, the gadget can no longer be used for the Smelting challenge.

==Usage==
* Modification: Travelers can modify the fireworks they have obtained, such as adjusting the color, size, and other parameters.
* Get Ready to Launch: You can select firework parameters, such as type and sequence, through the Ignition Prep menu to fire them off as you see fit.
